short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create your custom website yourself, with no experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Estimate My Project an easy app to let you calculate your project cost, Now you can get a reference to calculate your web. mobile (Android or IOS) or desktop apps costs and the ability to order your project .

all you have to do install the app, follow up the wizard steps to get more details of what features your project require.
then you select the services you want and customize it.

the app will show you the cost, so you can order it from  of the project you want to build and give you the ability to order it from  https://www.brightery.com
